thread.title: SecureBridge 6.6 Supports RAD Studio 10 Seattle
thread.title_full: SecureBridge 6.6 Supports RAD Studio 10 Seattle - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: SecureBridge 6.6 Supports RAD Studio 10 Seattle
text:
SecureBridge 6.6 Supports RAD Studio 10 Seattle
Devart released an update for SecureBridge components with support for RAD Studio 10 Seattle and other improvements.
Prague, Czech Republic, October 21, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Devart, a leading developer of database tools and database connectivity solutions, released a new version of SecureBridge. Version 6.6 now supports the latest RAD Studio 10 Seattle. Other improvements include support for CTR enryption mode, and possibility to connect to SSH and SSL servers via HTTP Tunnel.
SecureBridge represents clients and servers for SSH, SFTP and SSL protocols as a network security solution. It protects any TCP traffic using SSH or SSL secure transport layer protocols, that provide authentication for both client and server, strong data encryption, and data integrity verification. SecureBridge components can be used in conjunction with data access components to prevent data interception or modification in an untrusted network.
To learn more about new SecureBridge 6.6, please visit https://www.devart.com/sbridge/
About Devart
Devart is a recognized vendor of database connectivity solutions for Microsoft .NET and Embarcadero Delphi development platforms as well as database development and management software. Company's solutions support such databases as Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, InterBase, Firebird, DB2, SQLite, etc.
Along with database-oriented software, Devart offers productivity tools for Visual Studio and Skyvia, the cloud service for data integration, management and backup.
